alert.note: Alert for Inland Worcester; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:58PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Somerset, south central Wicomico and west central Worcester Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 857 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over University Of Maryland Eastern Shore, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fruitland, Princess Anne, University Of Maryland Eastern Shore, Westover, West Pocomoke, Widgeon, Cokesbury, Eden, Allen, Whitesburg and Lakewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
